mapper.select: select m.price,m.name,m.no,m.content,m.item_no,m.member_email,m.qty, m.img1,m.img2,m.img3,m.img4,m.img5,m.state,o.code as state,o.title as state_title from p1_order_state o inner join (select m.price,m.name,m.no,m.content,m.item_no,m.member_email,m.qty, i.img1,i.img2,i.img3,i.img4,i.img5,m.state from p1_market_img i inner join (select m.price,m.name,m.no,m.content,co.item_no,co.member_email,co.qty ,co.no as orderno,co.state from p1_market m INNER JOIN (select o.qty,o.cart_no,o.no,o.date1,c.item_no,c.member_email,o.state from p1_order o INNER JOIN p1_cart c ON c.no = o.cart_no) co ON m.no = co.item_no WHERE co.member_email = #{email} ORDER BY co.no DESC) m on m.item_no = i.no order by m.orderno desc) m on o.code = m.state
